summary: ‘Captain Marvel’​ Will Continue Female Superhero Dominance in China
title: ‘Captain Marvel’​ Will Continue Female Superhero Dominance in China
body:
FACT: ‘Captain Marvel’​ Will Continue Female Superhero Dominance in China

With Alita: Battle Angel dropping this weekend, it will have a couple of weekends until the MCU’s Captain Marvel dominates the stage.

By Ryan Carroll, Editor-at-Large

February, 2019.

I agree with Scott Mendelson‘s article from the end of last year, that projecting Captain Marvel to be the MCU’s next $1BnUSD hit may be more detrimental to the film’s outcome, if it comes in below that.

View On WordPress

summary: I know this doesn't need to be said because, you know, common fucking sense, but since apparently a lot of people don't have...
body:
I know this doesn’t need to be said because, you know, common fucking sense, but since apparently a lot of people don’t have this i wanna point out:

I, a 19-year old cishet male, can’t fucking wait to see Captain Marvel opening day

summary: Captain Marvel: why sexist attempts at sabotage will fail
title: Captain Marvel: why sexist attempts at sabotage will fail
description:
Brie Larson is the brand new public enemy number one but the movie is still on track for a US bow of more than $100m

“ For sexist keyboard warriors everywhere the mere sight of Captain Marvel’s Brie Larson must be enough to make them break out in hives. Here is a successful (Oscar-winning) woman playing the most powerful hero in the Marvel universe, according to studio chief Kevin Feige. In fact, her alter ego, Carol Danvers, might just be tough enough to take down Thanos himself in the forthcoming Avengers: Endgame.

This, to the average “men’s rights” advocate, is a concept of irredeemable outlandishness. For Danvers is a slender, sylph-like female in a natty 80s-inspired suit, while Thanos is a great, hulking, purple, musclebound male. Never mind that both are completely fictional with superpowers, the problem here is that (gritted teeth, bulging forehead vein) GIRLS WILL NEVER BE STRONGER THAN BOYS. OK? ” (…)

summary: Maria and I end every day talking about a life spent in the clouds as fighter pilots in the United States Air Force. It keeps us...
text:
Maria and I end every day talking about a life spent in the clouds as fighter pilots in the United States Air Force. It keeps us going, keeps us strong and focused.
Most important, it keeps us dreaming.
source: Carol Danvers in Higher, Further, Faster by Liza Palmer

reblog.comment: Carol Danvers in Higher, Further, Faster by Liza Palmer

blog.name: loveandsupportforcaptainmarvel
blog.title: Captain Marvel Doesn't Care For Your Sexism
blog.description: Blog dedicated to standing up to the hate directed at Captain Marvel

summary: White boys: “Brie Larson is so sexist and racist. I won’t be seeing Captain Marvel because I don’t support people like that.”...
body:
White boys: “Brie Larson is so sexist and racist. I won’t be seeing Captain Marvel because I don’t support people like that.”

Any sane person: “Actually, you can’t be sexist or racist towards white men. Here is a bunch of well thought out explanations that I learned in my college class taught by a professor with a PhD in psychology or women and gender studies who has spent there whole career studying this and has also done real research of their own in the field.” 

White boys: “LOL, you people are so stupid and brainwashed! You don’t know anything about sexism or racism! I know everything about it because I’m a white boy! You people are just trying to keep our society from moving forward by bringing up things that happened in the past! I focus on our future! And I want to see a world where white men aren’t treated like this! How dare you try to play the victim card when MEN are being treated like shit out there and MEN are suffering from this sexist bullshit! Women are far from the victims here! I can’t even objectify a woman without fear of going to jail! Or I can’t even say racist things around black people! You people are just proving my point by pushing this double standard! Just shut the fuck up if you don’t have anything intelligent to say! Fuck Captain Marvel!” 

Any sane person: “…What the fuck.”

reblog.comment:

You people are just trying to keep our society from moving forward by bringing up things that happened in the past! I focus on our future! And I want to see a world where white men aren’t treated like this! How dare you try to play the victim card when MEN are being treated like shit out there and MEN are suffering from this sexist bullshit! Women are far from the victims here! I can’t even objectify a woman without fear of going to jail! Or I can’t even say racist things around black people! You people are just proving my point by pushing this double standard! Just shut the fuck up if you don’t have anything intelligent to say! Fuck Captain Marvel!” 

Any sane person: “…What the fuck.”

White boys: “LOL, you people are so stupid and brainwashed! You don’t know anything about sexism or racism! I know everything about it because I’m a white boy! You people are just trying to keep our society from moving forward by bringing up things that happened in the past! I focus on our future! And I want to see a world where white men aren’t treated like this! How dare you try to play the victim card when MEN are being treated like shit out there and MEN are suffering from this sexist bullshit! Women are far from the victims here! I can’t even objectify a woman without fear of going to jail! Or I can’t even say racist things around black people! You people are just proving my point by pushing this double standard! Just shut the fuck up if you don’t have anything intelligent to say! Fuck Captain Marvel!” 

Any sane person: “…What the fuck.”

Here is a bunch of well thought out explanations that I learned in my college class taught by a professor with a PhD in psychology or women and gender studies who has spent there whole career studying this and has also done real research of their own in the field.” 

White boys: “LOL, you people are so stupid and brainwashed! You don’t know anything about sexism or racism! I know everything about it because I’m a white boy! summary: Mark Ruffalo: Is an outspoken feminist Men: ........”The new Avengers movie looks good” Brie Larson: Is an outspoken feminist...
body:
Mark Ruffalo: Is an outspoken feminist

Men: ……..”The new Avengers movie looks good”

Brie Larson: Is an outspoken feminist

Men: “I can’t stand all this feminist bullshit making its ways into our movies! Brie Larson is a man-hating, sexist pig! She’s turned Captain Marvel into another one of Disney’s propaganda! It’s Star Wars all over again! We need to boycott this movie to let them know we’re sick of these SJWs! #NotMyCaptain!”

blog.name: stopmakingliberalslookbad
blog.title: STOP MAKING LIBERALS LOOK BAD!
blog.description:
Asks will be turned back on once Carlos Albuquerque fucks off.

35. Female. Social democrat. Agnostic. Critical (not gender critical) feminist. Pro-social justice, but anti-extremism. I am well aware that my race, sexual orientation, gender identity, and age offer me certain privileges, thank you very much.

I don't do trigger warnings. I can't keep track of everyone's triggers.

I mostly access the site on my mobile browser, so I won't always see notifications or IMs. I'm not ignoring anybody, I swear!

PLEASE READ MY FAQ BEFORE ASKING ANY QUESTIONS, ESPECIALLY IF IT'S REGARDING MY URL!

Twitter: stfuregressives

summary: I really wanted to see Captain Marvel, until Bri Larson used her new found fame to complain about white men I've lost interest....
question: I really wanted to see Captain Marvel, until Bri Larson used her new found fame to complain about white men I've lost interest. Marvel should give Goose the Cat his own movie instead, co starring Nick Fury of course.
answer:
Yeah, even I’m getting sick of her and I don’t even follow superhero movies. Like it or not, she is alienating people. Promote the damn film and be grateful!

She also doesn’t seem sincere. It’s all “LOOK HOW WOKE I AM GAIZ!”

reblog.comment:
Yeah, even I’m getting sick of her and I don’t even follow superhero movies. Like it or not, she is alienating people. Promote the damn film and be grateful!

She also doesn’t seem sincere. It’s all “LOOK HOW WOKE I AM GAIZ!”

Yeah, even I’m getting sick of her and I don’t even follow superhero movies. Like it or not, she is alienating people. Promote the damn film and be grateful!

She also doesn’t seem sincere. It’s all “LOOK HOW WOKE I AM GAIZ!”
